title: Etrian Odyssey Origins Collection
description:
Create endless adventure with the Etrian Odyssey Origins Collection Explore the rich beginnings of this RPG franchise with remasters of three timeless adventures that inspire players to go on a journey of discovery, mapping deep dungeons, and building customized parties for exploring and engaging in tactical combat .
Play as the leader of a guild of adventurers , searching for rare treasures and secrets within the depths of a vast, sprawling labyrinth. Traverse and draw a map of the environment while encountering enemies large and small in turn-based combat, then return to town to rest, sell materials for better equipment, and manage your party, selecting from a collection of heroes to build the right team for the job. Friends vs Friends

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i3-540 or AMD Phenom II X3 720
system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 530, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 5570, 1 GB or Intel HD  4400
